nodes.text: Blood Ties: A Tale of Jango and Boba Fett 2
Blood Ties: A Tale of Jango and Boba Fett 2 is the second issue of 4 of a new miniseries of comics from Dark Horse Comics.
Then: Jango Fett, the most dangerous assassin/bounty hunter in the galaxy, never fails to get his man. But Jango has never had a success that has affected him this way.

Now: Boba Fett has taken up his father's mantle and lived up to Jango's fearsome reputation. But a secret from the past has Boba working a case he would normally dismiss and wondering if he actually knew his father as well as he thought...
Across the generations, and across the galaxy, if a Fett is on your trail, you've reached a dead end!

After killing the Clone trooper, Jango Fett finds out that his target had a wife and a one year old child named Connor Freeman. After many years Boba Fett takes a job to find Connor who owns a lot of money to crime lord Tayand. Boba finds out that his father had opened inheritance fund for Connor and he had received small payments from him. Boba finds Freeman and saves him from Bounty hunters.
The Aurebesh text in the hologram shown to Boba Fett says "CONNOR FREEMAN".
